title: GAIL inks deal with AM Green to set up 2.5 GW of renewable projects
description: GAIL and AM Green have agreed to jointly set up 2.5 GW of renewable energy projects in India. They will also explore using CO2 from GAIL's gas plants to produce e-Methanol. GAIL may invest in the e-Methanol project. The proposed renewable projects could supply continuous power, supported by Greenkoâ€™s pump storage projects.
